author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Madras High Court, on Thursday, ordered notice to the State government on a plea moved to implement the order of the Supreme Court restricting the use of ‘horn-type’ speakers.

Petitioner S. Kumarvelu, a resident of Perambur in Chennai, submitted that recently he had witnessed ‘horn-type’ speakers being used in religious and non-religious functions creating noise pollution at odd hours.

“ When I gathered more information, I came to know that the apex court had already banned their use in 2005,” Mr. Kumarvelu said.
title: Notice to TN on horn-type speakers
